name: Ben and Bella - Games
description: Developed to be played on the iPhone and iPad, this entertaining app encourages children aged 3 to 7 to discover English and expand their language-learning skills. Approved by teachers, parents and youngsters alike, the app focuses on ease of use. Children are plunged into a complete English-language environment that is lively, varied and  above all  fun.   With this app, your childs knowledge is boosted by  - learning the English names for many different animals, objects and colors - learning to read numbers and count to 10 - learning about size, distance, patterns and grouping - learning about concepts such as smallbig, nearfar and odd one out - enhancing problem-solving skills - improving fine motor skills  Features and advantages:  - a full English voice-over - an interface that preschoolers will find simple and intuitive - a read-aloud function that helps in pronunciation of words and numbers - colorful high-resolution artwork and lively music - interactive stickers that allow children to create their own scenes, which can be shared with friends via social media - a reward screen showing a childs achievement and motivating him/her to perform better  The app features 10 different games, each of which can be played with 6 different groups of words:   Find the Object: After hearing their names, children must find the right objects or animals. This game teaches English words while encouraging concentration and correct pronunciation.   Matching Pairs: Search among the hidden objects or animals and find the matching pairs. This game teaches English words and the concept of grouping, while training childrens memory.   Find the Color: Pick the right color on a multi-colored animal or object. While teaching the names of colors, this game encourages children to listen and look carefully.   Pick the Odd One Out: Find the odd animal or object in the group. Children must concentrate in order to distinguish one from the others.   Find the Biggest/Smallest: Children must identify the biggest or smallest among groups of animals or objects. This game teaches vocabulary and trains children to focus.   Count the Number: This games read-aloud function allows children to count the number of animals or objects, enhancing their number learning and counting skills.   Find the Farthest/Nearest: Children must identify farthest or nearest among groups of similar animals or objects. This game teaches word names and how to distinguish distances.   Complete the word - Drag the correct letter to complete the word by looking at the object. This games teaches to learn spelling of objects.    Match the Objects with their names - Drag and drop the names against the correct object. This game teaches object recognition from each other.    Choose the Objects highlighted - Pick the correct object whose names are highlighted in blue color. This game teaches object identification by reading the correct letter.   Engaging, entertaining and easy to understand, the Ben & Bella  Games app enhances young childrens English learning while they are having fun. Dont let your child miss out!
